content.question: The Great Awakening of the 1740s led to

choices.label: the growth of religious conformity throughout all the colonies
an increase in attacks on American Indian peoples
the establishment of Harvard College in Massachusetts
splits among existing religious denominations and the rise of new churches
the growth of hysteria in Massachusetts over witchcraft

content.answer: splits among existing religious denominations and the rise of new churches

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
